items.markText: In a broad sense, education aims at broadening young people's mental horizon, cultivating virtues and shaping their character.
She felt vaguely the pity of that child deprived of the only love in the world that is quite unselfish.
She loved him now with a new love because he had made her suffer.
Mrs. Carey sighed as a woman but obeyed as a wife.
the tears rolled down her cheeks
You know, there are two good things in life, freedom of thought and freedom of action.

items.markText: Life is there to be lived rather than to be written about.

users.name: Tinbird.

items.markText: Genius is an infinite capacity for taking pains.
He asked himself dully whether whenever you got your way you wished afterwards that you hadn't.

users.name: Tinbird.

items.markText: The great thing in life is to take risks.
Criticism is purely destructive; anyone can destroy, but not everyone can build up.
There are only two things in the world that make life worth living, love and art.
